islands.name: Intro
islands.description: You awaken on a peaceful island, your Personal Island. An unfamiliar voice calls out: Welcome, adventurer. Your journey across the Archipelago awaits.

actions.response: You are an adventurer chosen to explore and conquer the Archipelago.

islands.name: Personal Island
islands.description: It's a quiet and serene place where your journey begins. You can build and expand this island as you progress.

actions.response: You gather materials and build a small shelter to protect yourself.
You gather wood, stone, and other resources from around the island.

islands.description: The bustling center of the Archipelago. Merchants and adventurers gather here to trade and prepare for journeys to other islands.

npcs.name: Quest-Giver
npcs.dialogue: I have a quest for you, adventurer. Are you ready to accept it?

islands.name: Mining Island
islands.description: A rugged island rich in resources. Adventurers come here to mine valuable ores.

npcs.name: Miner
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to the Mining Island. Pick up a tool and start digging!

actions.response: You mine some coal, a valuable resource for crafting and trading.
You travel back to the Hub Island.

islands.name: Farming Island
islands.description: A fertile land full of crops. Adventurers come here to harvest food and other resources.

npcs.name: Farmer
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to the Farming Island. Grab a tool and start harvesting!

actions.response: You harvest some wheat, a valuable resource for crafting and trading.
You harvest some carrots, a valuable resource for crafting and trading.

islands.name: Combat Island
islands.description: A dangerous place filled with enemies. Adventurers come here to fight and earn valuable rewards.

npcs.name: Warrior
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to the Combat Island. Prepare yourself for battle!
